Name: Boots Versus Plants
About the game: Features Explore locations with a variety of traps. Fight with dangerous mutant plants. Infinite Ammo. Open doors and mechanisms. Save plants from a dangerous virus and keep the balance of power. Lots of funny elements and references to popular characters. Boots Corporation sends a Colonel named 'Daisy' to battle with dangerous plants to destroy them all! Find out the cause of infection and mutations of domestic cacti that have become intelligent monsters.

Meta Description: Looking for information on Boots Versus Plants? Check out the release date (Mar 14, 2021), developer insights from Dnovel, and a complete game summary.
